experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.summary: Led front-end and BFF work for the Lowe’s Returns Android and web apps, improving scalability and developer velocity.
bullets: Led adoption of a micro-frontend architecture for the Lowe’s Returns Android app, improving scalability and developer velocity.
Implemented new UX flows using React, Ionic, and Capacitor for the Returns Android application used by sales-floor associates.
Built and maintained a Node.js + Fastify Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) powering Returns Android and Web apps, including optimized REST APIs, request validation, and cross-service orchestration.

experiences.title: Full-stack Web Developer
experiences.summary: Delivered end-to-end web applications and infrastructure for startups and SMBs, handling scoping, development, and deployments.
bullets: Delivered end-to-end web applications for startups and SMBs, handling scoping, architecture, and full-stack development.
Implemented applications using Next.js, Node.js, and Go.
Deployed on AWS using custom CDK stacks and built CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions.
Sourced and managed clients through Upwork.

experiences.title: Front End Engineer
experiences.summary: Built and launched React experiences for the AWS IAM Console and participated in operational on-call and status reporting.
bullets: Led implementation and launch of new React user experiences on the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) Console, impacting thousands of customers.
Participated in a monthly on-call rotation: resolved customer issues, triaged CloudWatch alarms, debugged service degradations, and collaborated with backend teams to restore service health.
Presented weekly operational status updates to the broader Identity organization.
Voluntarily relocated closer to family and left AWS (not affected by layoffs).

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.summary: Contributed to a Dart + React web application and followed Agile practices including testing and code review.
bullets: Contributed to development on a Dart + React–based web application (Wdesk).
Worked within Agile methodologies; participated in code reviews and wrote unit and integration tests.

experiences.title: Web Software Developer Intern
experiences.summary: Sole developer of an Audio Engineering discrepancy logger using a MEAN-style stack and containerized for CI/CD.
bullets: Developed an Audio Engineering discrepancy logger as sole developer using MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js.
Containerized the application with Docker for CI/CD.

education.summary: Bachelor of Software Engineering; coursework and projects in software development.

awards.title: Technical Education Senior Award
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding work and dedication in Technical Education.
bullets: Awarded to students who exhibited outstanding work and dedication in the area of Technical Education.

awards.title: WSC Logo Design — 1st Place
awards.summary: First place prize in a logo design competition.
bullets: Won 1st place and $1,000 in a logo design competition hosted by the Wheaton Sport Center (Wheaton, IL).
